BundleFilterLogic.name: MyOpenTasksFilter
ExpirationTodayFilter
ExpirationWithinMonthFilter30
ExpirationWithinMonthFilter90

BundleFilterLogic.ExecutionScript: var agrType = thisBundle.getInfoValueObject("agrType"); result = agrType == 'Sub Agreement';
var agrType = thisBundle.getInfoValueObject("agrType"); result = agrType == 'Standard Sales';
var agrType = thisBundle.getInfoValueObject("agrType"); result = agrType == 'Change Order';
var agrType = thisBundle.getInfoValueObject("agrType"); result = agrType == 'Order Form';
var agrType = thisBundle.getInfoValueObject("agrType"); result = agrType == 'Work Order';
